Handshake Tangela just messaged you about an event Tangela Woodley Employer Branding - Inspiring YOU to work at L'Oreal · 
L'Oréal Hi Ankita! Maybe you haven't gotten a chance to register yet, I'm just following up on my message to make sure you don't miss out on this amazing event L'Oréal Masterclass: Craft the Future of Lux... View message L'Oréal Virtual Event L'Oréal Masterclass: Craft the Future of Luxury Fragrance Mon, Dec 8 ⋅ 5:30 pm–6:15 pm EST Virtual View message Mute You received this email because Handshake partners with your school to help you grow your career. Manage email preferences or unsubscribe . P.O. Box 40770, San Francisco, CA 94140

metadata.subject: L'Oréal Invites You To Our Masterclass: Craft the Future of Luxury Fragrance
